This article is about the original Horicraft server. For its spiritual successor, see Horicraft (2).

Horicraft

Horicraft¬π (formerly known as the StuffyXP Minecraft Server) was a creative Minecraft server owned and operated by Horibyte. It was initially announced by them on 3 December 2024, on the StuffyXP Hangout Discord Server, however it would only begin gaining significant popularity from late January 2025.

Main cities built in Horicraft include Horilandese cities like the capital Fucking or Jell. As the world spawn, Fucking is home to most of Horicraft‚Äôs players as well as facitilies like Dogui Heavy Industries Incorporated. Jell is mainly known for its tourist attraction, the B Parkour, shaped as a üÖ±Ô∏è cube.

Players of Horicraft can travel between Jell, Fucking, or other places across the Horicraft world using the Horicraft Underground Rail System (HURS, using minecarts), Horicraft Water Transportation System (HWTS, using boats), or using Nether Portals or pathes in cities by foot.

Horicraft officially shut down on 11 March 2025 after a disagreement between the server hoster and Horibyte, after just over 3 months. Any instance of the original Horicraft that would remain open would no longer be official/endorsed by Horibyte. It was later succeeded by Horicraft (2), a survival Minecraft server.


The city of Fucking, Horiland, as it was built in Horicraft. This is the spawn area

¹↑ Retroactively known as Horicraft (1) or the original Horicraft, following the creation of Horicraft (2).
